meanings.definition: Inclining or slanting in direction or position.
meanings.sent1: The sloping roof allowed rainwater to flow easily.
meanings.sent2: The sloping road made it difficult to ride a bike uphill.
meanings.sent3: The sloping driveway caused the ball to roll away unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her sloping handwriting resembled a mountain range on paper.
meanings.sent5: The sloping hillside was a challenge to climb but offered a beautiful view at the top.

meanings.definition: Having a surface that is not level or flat.
meanings.sent1: The sloping floor in the old house made furniture arrangement tricky.
meanings.sent2: The sloping field made it hard to set up a tent for camping.
meanings.sent3: The sloping table caused the marbles to roll towards one end during the game.
meanings.sent4: Her sloping smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sloping path through the forest led to a hidden waterfall.
